headerText: Dependable Power Washing with Excellent Customer Service
body:
DAVESTAR POWERWASHING is a reputable company known for its dependability and excellent customer service. We take pride in our commitment to delivering high-quality power washing services on time, every time. Our motto is 'It's not done till you say it's done', highlighting our dedication to customer satisfaction.

We have been recognized for our outstanding services with awards from Angieslist, including the super service award in 2014 and the honor roll in 2016. While we do not hold any specific certifications, our track record and customer reviews speak volumes about our expertise and professionalism.

Our primary service is Power Washing, but we also offer a range of secondary services including House Washing, Gutter Cleaning, Driveway Cleaning, Walkway Cleaning, Deck Cleaning, and Commercial Buildings. We strive to provide comprehensive cleaning solutions to meet all your exterior cleaning needs.
